creator: rami.ojares@legosoft.net
text:
When creating new folder(collection) and right away listing it's contents
Tomcat says that the new folder does not exist. But when trying to list the 
contents of the folder again it is found.

Also the renaming of a folder does not work. This works in 4.1.12.

creator: remm@apache.org
text: There was a bug with folder caching. Try again in 4.1.24.
